title: 20 min ban
body:
So i got a 20 min ban a month ago and now i got one again 
i just wanted to know when the ban goes back to being a 5 min ban......

im new here so i just wanted know. :)

replies.body: riot i am afk for your bugs asnd  you give me 20 min ban in new season {{champion:32}} {{item:3681}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Damn, a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) timer for that long usually happens only after a consistent history of leaves.  You'll have to continue playing your required game as your first step, but then constantly stay in games well after.  I couldn't really say for sure when that is, because really it's up to you.  Let me know if you have any questions!
